page.title: 20WORKERS FROM DAVIOT. CTD.
page.content: My Dad is a plumber. My Mum is a secretary. They both go into Inverness to work. My Mum does bed and breakfast, in the summer. We get lots of tourists to stay as we live out in the country near the main road. My dad works in a garage called Hawcos.He sells cars.My mum has just started Bed and Breakfast.Last year we owned a restaurant.It has just been converted into a flat. My Mum and Dad own a Caravan and Camping Site with a restaurant and bar.We used to do Bed and Breakfast before we opened the bar and restaurant.Our restraurant is called the DeerStalker. My Mum works and cleans for a lady who gives us a cottage to live in.My dad was an engineer and he went to the Falkland Islands on the Coastal Pioneer.
